name: Git Context Loader
description: Loads git status and project structure at session start
command: echo '## Project Context' && echo && echo '### Git Status' && git status -s 2>/dev/null || echo 'Not a git repository' && echo && echo '### Recent Commits' && git log --oneline -5 2>/dev/null || true && echo && echo '### Project Structure' && find . -type f -name '*.json' -o -name '*.js' -o -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.py' -o -name '*.java' -o -name '*.go' | grep -E -v '(node_modules|.git|dist|build|target)' | head -20 || true
